entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 40%
